verses.plain: I waited patiently for the LORD; and he inclined unto me, and heard my cry.

tokens.t: I waited patiently for the
; and he inclined unto me, and heard my cry.

verses.plain: He brought me up also out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.

tokens.t: He brought me up also out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock,
established my goings.

verses.plain: And he hath put a new song in my mouth, even praise unto our God: many shall see it, and fear, and shall trust in the LORD.

tokens.t: And he hath put a new song in my mouth,
praise unto our God: many shall see
, and fear, and shall trust in the

verses.plain: Blessed is that man that maketh the LORD his trust, and respecteth not the proud, nor such as turn aside to lies.

tokens.t: Blessed
that man that maketh the
his trust, and respecteth not the proud, nor such as turn aside to lies.

verses.plain: Many, O LORD my God, are thy wonderful works which thou hast done, and thy thoughts which are to us-ward: they cannot be reckoned up in order unto thee: if I would declare and speak of them, they are more than can be numbered.

tokens.t: Many, O
my God,
thy wonderful works
thou hast done, and thy thoughts
to us-ward: they cannot be reckoned up in order unto thee:
I would declare and speak
, they are more than can be numbered.

verses.plain: Sacrifice and offering thou didst not desire; mine ears hast thou opened: burnt offering and sin offering hast thou not required.

tokens.t: Sacrifice and offering thou didst not desire; mine ears hast thou opened: burnt offering and sin offering hast thou not required.

verses.plain: Then said I, Lo, I come: in the volume of the book it is written of me,

tokens.t: Then said I, Lo, I come: in the volume of the book
written of me,

verses.plain: I delight to do thy will, O my God: yea, thy law is within my heart.

tokens.t: I delight to do thy will, O my God: yea, thy law
within my heart.

verses.plain: I have preached righteousness in the great congregation: lo, I have not refrained my lips, O LORD, thou knowest.

tokens.t: I have preached righteousness in the great congregation: lo, I have not refrained my lips, O
, thou knowest.

verses.plain: I have not hid thy righteousness within my heart; I have declared thy faithfulness and thy salvation: I have not concealed thy lovingkindness and thy truth from the great congregation.

tokens.t: I have not hid thy righteousness within my heart; I have declared thy faithfulness and thy salvation: I have not concealed thy lovingkindness and thy truth from the great congregation.

verses.plain: Withhold not thou thy tender mercies from me, O LORD: let thy lovingkindness and thy truth continually preserve me.

tokens.t: Withhold not thou thy tender mercies from me, O
: let thy lovingkindness and thy truth continually preserve me.

verses.plain: For innumerable evils have compassed me about: mine iniquities have taken hold upon me, so that I am not able to look up; they are more than the hairs of mine head: therefore my heart faileth me.

tokens.t: For innumerable evils have compassed me about: mine iniquities have taken hold upon me, so that I am not able to look up; they are more than the hairs of mine head: therefore my heart faileth me.

verses.plain: Be pleased, O LORD, to deliver me: O LORD, make haste to help me.

tokens.t: Be pleased, O
, to deliver me: O
, make haste to help me.

verses.plain: Let them be ashamed and confounded together that seek after my soul to destroy it; let them be driven backward and put to shame that wish me evil.

tokens.t: Let them be ashamed and confounded together that seek after my soul to destroy it; let them be driven backward and put to shame that wish me evil.

verses.plain: Let them be desolate for a reward of their shame that say unto me, Aha, aha.

tokens.t: Let them be desolate for a reward of their shame that say unto me, Aha, aha.

verses.plain: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: let such as love thy salvation say continually, The LORD be magnified.

tokens.t: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: let such as love thy salvation say continually, The
be magnified.

verses.plain: But I am poor and needy; yet the Lord thinketh upon me: thou art my help and my deliverer; make no tarrying, O my God.

tokens.t: But I
poor and needy;
the Lord thinketh upon me: thou
my help and my deliverer; make no tarrying, O my God.

footnotes.text: I waited…: Heb. In waiting I waited
an…: Heb. a pit of noise
they cannot…: or, none can order them unto thee
within…: Heb. in the midst of my bowels
